pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Tuesday, March 22, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

The Prime Minister will speak with the President of Ukraine, Volodymyr Zelenskyy.

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Room 200
Sir John A. Macdonald Building
144 Wellington Street
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

9:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Brussels, Belgium.

Canada Reception Centre
190 Clear Skies Private
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 8:30 p.m.
